ðŸ“– Summary: The Visual Story-Writing repository provides a system that automatically visualizes a story based on its chronological events, characters, actions, and movements. It allows users to edit the story by manipulating these visual representations, with GPT-4o suggesting edits to the text based on the visual changes.
